name: Bulb Against The Machines
description:
Help Bulb to fight the system and find their friend !

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to Move
  • Space to Wait
  • Left Click to interact with objects near you / in inventory
  • Right Click / Escape to Cancel actions
  • Bump into objects to Attack / Open / Pickup ...
  • Save your friend !

Made in 7 days (mostly evenings tbh :P) for the 7DRL 2023 game jam.
